text: Peter Matthiessen (May 22, 1927 â€“ April 5, 2014) was an American novelist, naturalist, and wilderness writer. He is known for his books The Snow Leopard and In the Spirit of Crazy Horse. Matthiessen died on April 5, 2014 from leukemia in Sagaponack, New York, aged 86.Peter Matthiessen, Author and Naturalist, Is Dead at 86 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American naturalists Category:American novelists Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state) Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Writers from New York City
